alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 7:43AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lee, Sumter, southeastern Richland and south central Kershaw Counties through 830 AM EST... At 743 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Poinsett State Park, or 7 miles southwest of Shaw Air Base, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sumter, Camden, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Eastover, Oakland, Mulberry, Sumter County Airport, Gadsden, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Lugoff, Cane Savannah, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Manville, Spring Hill, North Towne Square Shopping Center and Wedgewood. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 93 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
